WriterProxy.name: MyTIFFWriter
WriterProxy.label: My TIFF Writer

Documentation.short_help: Write image data as a TIF file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writes image data as a TIFF data file. Data can be written uncompressed or compressed. Several forms of compression are supported including packed bits, JPEG, and deflation. By setting a file pattern, you can write a sequence of slices.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.label: File Prefix
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The prefix of the file name.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePattern
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The sprintf format used to build filename from FilePrefix and number.

IntVectorProperty.name: Compression
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The type of compression used in the file.
